body: Thanks for reporting this @Anass-ELGHAOUI, could provide a test reproducing the issue to help us investigate? thanks!

issue.title: Fix ignoringFields with different map size

labels.name: theme: recursive comparison
labels.description: An issue related to the recursive comparison

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
Fix ignoringFields behavior that doesn't work properly when using maps of different sizes with usingRecursiveComparison and isEqualTo for example.

Fix #2988

body: Hi I want to join your community so that I can also help you guys

rename.from: usingRecursiveComparison().ignoringFields("fieldName") is not working properly when maps sizes are different
rename.to: Recursive comparison `ignoringFields` not working properly with maps
